name: Escape to West Germany
description:
Follow in Wolfgang Engels' footsteps and drive a stolen BTR-152 through the streets of Berlin! Try not to raise suspicion by keeping to the red lights, and find your way to the wall!

Key Features:

- Drive-able truck with multiple camera angles 

- Traffic-lights that raise a detection metre

- A confusing maze to be traversed

Credits:

- Catriona Barclay

(Music is royalty free and in public use)

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
